summary.span: 指定安全性事件的审核行为。

span.span: Specifies the audit behavior of security events.

summary.span: 通常，安全性事件包含身份验证事件（如传输、消息或协商身份验证）和授权事件。

span.span: In general, the security events consist of authentication events such as transport, message or negotiate authentication and authorization event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于审核 Windows Communication Foundation （WCF）身份验证事件。The class is used to audit Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) authentication events. 当启用了审核时，可对成功或失败的身份验证尝试（或这两者）进行审核。When auditing is enabled, either successful or failed authentication attempts (or both) can be audited. 事件会写入到三个事件日志之一：操作系统版本的应用程序日志、安全日志或默认日志。The events are written to one of three event logs: application, security, or the default log for the operating system version. 可以使用 Windows 事件查看器查看所有事件日志。The event logs can all be viewed using the Windows Event viewer. 使用此类可指定要写入的事件日志，以及要写入的身份验证事件的种类。Use this class to specify which event log is written to, as well as kinds of authentication events to write. 您还可以通过将 属性设置为 `false`（默认值为 `true`）来指定是否要禁止显示审核失败。You can also specify whether to suppress audit failures by setting the property to `false` (the default is `true`). 有关审核 WCF 应用程序安全事件的详细信息，请参阅[审核](/dotnet/framework/wcf/feature-details/auditing-security-events)。For more information about auditing security events for WCF applications, see [Auditing](/dotnet/framework/wcf/feature-details/auditing-security-events). 若要在配置中指定审核行为，请使用[<serviceSecurityAudit>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicesecurityaudit)。To specify audit behavior in configuration, use the [<serviceSecurityAudit>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicesecurityaudit). ## Examples 下面的代码创建 类的一个实例，然后向其行为集合添加一个新的 。The following code creates an instance of the class and adds a new to its collection of behaviors. remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows Communication Foundation （WCF）服务应用程序具有两个可强制实施安全的级别。Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) service applications have two levels where security can be enforced. 在*服务*级别，该服务的所有方法都由相同的安全策略强制实施。At the *service* level, all methods of the service are enforced by the same security policy. 服务中的个别方法可能具有不同的（更为严格的）安全策略。Individual methods in the service can have a different (more stringent) security policy. 使用 属性可控制要审核的消息级别事件。Use the property to control which message level events are audited. 你还可以在客户端应用程序配置文件中使用[<serviceSecurityAudit>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicesecurityaudit)设置此值。You can also set this value using the [<serviceSecurityAudit>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicesecurityaudit) in a client application configuration file. ## Examples 下面的代码创建 类的实例并设置此属性。The following code creates an instance of the class and sets this property.
